title: What do you think about the rework Yorick.
body: I think it is really i liked how his E makes his minions jump on enemies but u had to build ap to get it stronger when yorick is mostly ad that was 1 of the bad parts the other is that i wish  you could control your ult to move where you want it to move. That is my thoughts thanks you.{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:12}}

replies.body: The AP scaling is good, if it scaled off AD might do a bit too much damage. Might make for an interesting off-meta build though. I think the rework is a really cool original concept. Riot did a good job in him!

I've been enjoying playing him support... i know its not where a lot of people play him but, play like you would a "tanky" support.
Relic shield + Q to execute minions and get graves
Your wall can be used to either hard engage on the bot lane or stop a gank if you're accurate enough.
And the best part, your ghouls and maiden allow you and the adc to chunk down a towers HP even with (or even without) only a minion or two
 - on that note, do your ghouls/maiden count as "Minions" in regard to reducing the fortification for towers?
But wouldnt it be bad taking your adc's farm with that but its good for the heal

The only thing that annoys me is that if your ghoul attacks a minion in an lane it will stay in that lane i would like it if you could control your minion or Maiden of mist so it will make it easier in team fights.
